titles.title: Expand Opportunity for Education Savings Act of 2012
Expand Opportunity for Education Savings Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow 529 tuition programs with respect to elementary and secondary education expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Expand Opportunity for Education Savings Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) expand the definition of "eligible educational institution" for purposes of tax-exempt qualified tuition programs (529 tuition programs) to include elementary and secondary schools, and (2) make the limitation on room and board expenses inapplicable to elementary and secondary schools.
